title: Top 8 OOL Team looking for Top/AD
body:
If you would like to trial you MUST have the following:

Working Mic
Be Diamond 3 or above.
Desire to improve.
Able to handle criticism.

Add IGN: Sivrus, for any info or further questions.

Thank you.

replies.body:
Interested in applying as an emergency sub.
Diamond III, working mic, great desire to improve, able to handle constructive criticism and can play Top/Jungle.
